plot: Crack addiction tosses JT out of his comfort zone into the shadows of the city. Mickey, a veteran street hustler, takes him as his apprentice, teaching him the tricks of the trade. ...
title: Apprentice
plot_es: Crack addiction tosses JT out of his comfort zone into the shadows of the city. Mickey, a veteran street hustler, takes him as his apprentice, teaching him the tricks of the trade. ...
